name: Meaning of salat
description: We are praying every day, but we may not know anything about what we are saying or reading in prayer, because we do not know the meaning, we can not concentrate more properly on the prayers.  Through this app you will know the meaning of Arabic for every rakat, surah and prostration used in prayer. Which will assist you to be fully focused in prayer.
